description: This file sets up various knowledge bases (CSV, PDF, website, local PDFs), combines them into a single knowledge base, initializes an agent with this knowledge, loads the knowledge base, and then uses the agent to print a response. It primarily contains class instantiations, configuration, and method calls related to knowledge base setup and agent interaction.

classes.name: CSVKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base class for CSV files, initialized with a file path and vector database.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base class for PDFs accessible via URLs, initialized with a list of URLs and a vector database.

classes.name: WebsiteKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base class for website content, initialized with URLs, max links, and a vector database.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base class for local PDF files, initialized with a directory path and a vector database.

classes.name: CombinedKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A composite knowledge base that aggregates multiple sources.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and can generate responses.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, with an option to recreate it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent based on a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
